greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows: T(n,k) (n>=1, 0 <= k <= n^2) = minimal number of squares attacked by k queens on an n X n toroidal board.
comment: A279405(n) is maximal m such that T(n,m) >= m.
Generally, T(n,k') <= n^2-k if and only if T(n,k) <= n^2-k'.
link: Andrey Zabolotskiy, First 9 rows of the triangle and a part of row 10
results.author: _Andrey Zabolotskiy_, Dec 11 2016
